p.s: The drama extract from Macbeth by Shakespeare is about a conversation between Macbeth and his wife Lady Macbeth who tries to convince Macbeth to kill kingKing Duncan to get a higher position as king.
In the beginning Macbeth holds a soliloquy.
He thinks about to kill kingKing Duncan but does not really want it because of him is honoured and has a high reputation.
MacbathMacbeth knows he should not kill the kingKing but Lady Macbeth interrupts him.
She explains that he should get what he wants and not be a coward.
He has to fight and to be brave.
But Macbeth is unsure if that behaviour fits to a menman.
His wife convinceconvinces him that that is a menman and that the time and place are now.
Then Macbeth is frightened to fail and Lady Macbeth tries to convince him another time.
She tells him that she will get the servants of Duncan drunk and no one will see what is happening.
She convinced Macbeth and he start to organize the happening.
